Keywords: Avengers , Latveria , Mystical , Past , Ruler
Real Name: Morgan Le Fay
Special Powers
REBORN ONCE AGAIN!: Morgan Le Fay may be played on click #1 for 100 points or click #4 for 50 points. Morgan Le Fay gains Mystics Team Symbol.
MY ALTERNATE AVENGERS: When establishing themed teams, you may treat Avengers and Latveria as a single named keyword. // Perplex.
COLD STEEL IS MY BANE: When an opposing character deals damage with an object, or while using Blades/Claws/Fangs, or while equipped, increase the damage dealt to Morgan Le Fay by 1.
ASTRAL FORM FADE: Toughness. // FREE: Choose one to use until your next turn: Combat Reflexes or Energy Shield/Deflection.
